A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was amazing. As an avid Star Wars fan\, I can see some of the cheekiness not being for everyone. But let me tell you I was 100 percent thrilled with the entire ride.

Each sequence with Luke was done brilliantly. 

The Rae and Kylo Ren scenes were perfect and the late Carrie Fisher stole the show.

The action sequences were perfect and in true form to Star Wars.

I can easily say I will watch this another 20+ times.
